League 1
PSG: "I will do everything to stay here"
The Argentine striker loaned by Inter Milan in the capital club has returned to the scenes of his transfer to PSG, before claiming his desire to stay.
04 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Charlie Creteur



In 9 games, the striker loaned by Inter Milan has already scored 7 goals in all competitions, including the injury of Edinson Cavani. Yet a few months ago, it was still difficult to imagine the native of Rosario Mauro Icardi in the club of the capital. Recruited in the last hours of the summer mercato, he returned to the scenes of his transfer, Leonardo was the main craftsman. "We talked on the phone," he said in an interview for RMC Sport. "He told me that I could become an important player on a team again, because I was out at Inter, he asked me to come, to help the team, he told me the goals of the team".







Mauro Icardi wants to stay!




Mauro Icardi celebrating his goal against OM with his team-mates + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Meanwhile, the striker trained at FC Barcelona intends to stay in the capital and makes it known. "I have to prove myself in the field," he continued. "We had a good month in October, but there is so much to do, I have to prove myself in the coming months, we'll see at the end of the season if I'm staying, I want to do good things, I've come for that. Obviously, playing for a team like PSG is very important, it's one of the best teams in the world, it's a step forward in my career and I'll do anything to stay here.
